'''Strange Shifts''' is a World Quest that is part of the [[Crimson Wish]] event in [[Dragonspine]], [[Mondstadt]].

==Steps==
{{Quest Description| The automated defense mechanisms of the ancient ruins have been activated by the power of some crystals. If you can destroy these automated mechanisms in a short time, you may gain the Crimson Agate that the Frostbearing Tree longs for.}}
;Version 1
#Complete Time Trial Challenge

==Enemies==
*{{Enemy|Defense Mechanism|x=2}}
